properties.value: Jade is a type of semi-precious gem. Jades can be cut from uncut jades with level 13 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 20 experience. While cutting jades, the player may accidentally crush an uncut jade into a crushed gem and will receive only 5 Crafting experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make jade jewellery.

This article is about the gem. For the bank teller, see Jade (Warriors' Guild).

Item ID1611

Jade is a type of semi-precious gem. Jades can be cut from uncut jades with level 13 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 20 experience. While cutting jades, the player may accidentally crush an uncut jade into a crushed gem and will receive only 5 Crafting experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make jade jewellery.

Cutting chance[edit | edit source]

The chance to successfully cut a jade is: ⌊ ( level − 1 ) ∗ 145 / 98 + 101 ⌋ 256 {\displaystyle {\frac {\lfloor ({\text{level}}-1)*145/98+101\rfloor }{256}}} [1]

Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut jade 154, and the price of jade 323, the minimum crafting level to breakeven or better when flipping jade is 16.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Jades can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a silver bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[t 1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
13 Jade Silver bar 413 Jade ring 604 191 32 20,800 5.97
25 Jade Silver bar 413 Jade necklace 673 260 54 35,100 4.81
26 Jade 154 Jade bolt tips x12 84 −239 2 5,800 −119.5
29 Jade Silver bar 413 Jade bracelet 671 258 60 39,000 4.3
34 Jade Silver bar 413 Jade amulet (u) 657 244 70 45,500 3.49
34 Jade amulet (u) Ball of wool 692 Jade amulet 908 216 4 8,000 54
  1. ↑ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Jade jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-2 Enchant, requiring level 27 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 3 Air runes, and the piece of Jade Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[t 1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Jade ring 604 697 Ring of returning 909 212 37 59,200 5.73
Jade necklace 673 766 Necklace of passage 1,155 389 37 59,200 10.51
Jade bracelet 671 764 Flamtaer bracelet 873 109 37 59,200 2.95
Jade amulet 908 1,001 Amulet of chemistry 1,352 351 37 59,200 9.49
  1. ↑ Cost calculated using a Staff of air (provides unlimited Air runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.
